text:
observed for Tomcat 5.5.15 (not listed!)

The manager webapp supports webapp deployment by uploading the war-file.

If the file-browser is used to select the war-file (by clicking the "choose" 
button), "/bla/bla/mywebapp.war" is entered into the text-field rather than /bla
/bla/mywebapp.war. Consequently, it doesn't work.

Removing the double quotes by hand makes it work.
creator: rob.dickens@lafros.com

text:
Updating Tomcat version to 5.5.15.  Is this really a Tomcat issue or is it the
Java or browser select file dialog that doing this?
creator: yoavs@computer.org
markt@apache.org
text: Must be a browser issue. It doesn't do it for me with FireFox.
